content.heading: HTML Lists
paragraphs: HTML lists structure related items in ordered, unordered, or descriptive formats.

content.heading: Unordered Lists
paragraphs: Unordered lists use <ul> with <li> for each item, marked by bullets by default:

content.heading: Ordered Lists
paragraphs: Ordered lists use <ol> with <li> for each item, numbered automatically:

content.heading: Description Lists
paragraphs: Description lists use <dl> for the list, <dt> for terms, and <dd> for descriptions:

<dl>
  <dt>HTML</dt>
  <dd>Markup language for web pages</dd>
  <dt>CSS</dt>
  <dd>Styles visual layout</dd>
</dl>
